verbs.description: [V: smoke] [ARG0: fire] department seen during power problem on red line an electrical fire on mbta train tracks shut down service on part of the red line but service has since resumed service was suspended between fields corner and broadway after the overnight fire inside a tunnel near the andrew square station the mbta said full service resumed just before 6 a m witness kyle thomas said he was evacuated from a red line train by a conductor who told passengers there was a fire in front of the stopped train kyle thomas red line mbta andrew station massachusetts bay transportation authority
